title: Add the location 19,-120 to the Points of Interest
body:
> by 0x919c0e02cab272b50d0cfa2c70a653ce96f589a6 (Tei)

## Metazone playground

![Metazone playground](https://api.decentraland.org/v1/parcels/19/-120/map.png)

Should the scene located at 19,-120 be added to the Point of Interest list?

## Description

This place is really cool. A building, with a remarquable architecture. It s totaly finish, all work, the elevators can to bring you to 4 floors, 3 up, and 1 underground. You can buy the nfts from nice artists, but also make only a simple visit enjoy

**[Vote on this proposal on the Decentraland DAO](https://governance.decentraland.org/en/proposal/?id=9bd1da80-cec6-11eb-9861-ebb8fcfd58d2)**
author: 0x5E23D08324f017d5425e59A2782C9ae27aCE0958
